00021 #ifndef __I18N_H__
00022 #define __I18N_H__
00023 
00024 #include "config.h"
00025 
00026 #ifdef ENABLE_NLS
00027 #  include <libintl.h>
00028 #  undef _
00029 #  define _(String) dgettext (GETTEXT_PACKAGE, String)
00030 #  ifdef gettext_noop
00031 #    define N_(String) gettext_noop (String)
00032 #  else
00033 #    define N_(String) (String)
00034 #  endif
00035 #else
00036 #  define textdomain(String) (String)
00037 #  define gettext(String) (String)
00038 #  define ngettext(String1,String2,Count) (Count==1?String1:String2)
00039 #  define dgettext(Domain,Message) (Message)
00040 #  define dcgettext(Domain,Message,Type) (Message)
00041 #ifdef __WATCOMC__
00042 #    define bind_textdomain_codeset(Domain,Codeset)
00043 #    define bindtextdomain(Domain,Directory)
00044 #else
00045 #    define bind_textdomain_codeset(Domain,Codeset) (Codeset)
00046 #    define bindtextdomain(Domain,Directory) (Domain)
00047 #endif
00048 #  define _(String) (String)
00049 #  define N_(String) (String)
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 #endif /* __I18N_H__ */
